Package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller

Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.controller.MenuController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/menu") @CrossOrigin public class MenuController extends Object
A controller for Menu, uses the "/menu" mapping.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuController

      public MenuController()

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      @PostMapping("/add") public String addItem(@RequestBody Menu menu)
      Use "/add" on PostMapping to save the order to the database (generates the menuId randomly), returns the menu entity added to the database.
      Parameters:
      menu - Provided in the request body is the menu to be added to the db with a new random ID(if the provided order has a UID it will be overwritten).
      Returns:
      The menu entity saved to the db (with new UID).

    • addAll

      @PostMapping("/addAll") public int addAll(@RequestBody Menu[] list)

    • updateAll

      @PostMapping("/update") public Menu updateAll(@RequestBody Menu menu)

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/getAll") public List<Menu> getAll()
      Use "/getAll" on getMapping to return all menu entities in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all the Menu entities in the db.

    • deleteItem

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteItem/{id}") public void deleteItem(@PathVariable String id)

    • updatePrice

      @PutMapping("/editPrice/{menuid}/{price}") public Menu updatePrice(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String price)
      Use "/editPrice/menuid/price" followed by the menuId then price on putMapping to find the menuId and change its price.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the price of.
      price - The price that'll overwrite the previous price.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateName

      @PutMapping("/editName/{menuid}/{pname}") public Menu updateName(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String pname)
      Use "/editName/menuid/pname" followed by the menuId then pname on putMapping to find the menuId and change its pname.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the pname of.
      pname - The pname that'll overwrite the previous pname.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateDescription

      @PutMapping("/editDescription/{menuid}/{description}") public Menu updateDescription(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String description)
      Use "/editDescription/" followed by the menuId then description on putMapping to find the menuId and change its description.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the description of.
      description - The price that'll overwrite the previous description.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateCalories

      @PutMapping("/editCalories/{menuid}/{calories}") public Menu updateCalories(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String calories)
      Use "/editCalories/" followed by the menuId then calories on putMapping to find the menuId and change its calories.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the calories of.
      calories - The calories that'll overwrite the previous calories field.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateIngredients

      @PutMapping("/editIngredients/{menuid}/{ingredients}") public Menu updateIngredients(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String ingredients)
      Use "/editIngredients/" followed by the menuId then ingredients on putMapping to find the menuId and change its ingredients.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the ingredients of.
      ingredients - The ingredients that'll overwrite the previous ingredients field.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateAvailability

      @PutMapping("/editAvailability/{menuid}/{availability}") public Menu updateAvailability(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String availability)
      Use "/editAvailability/" followed by the menuId then availability on putMapping to find the menuId and change its availability.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the availability of.
      availability - The calories that'll overwrite the previous availability field.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • updateCourse

      @PutMapping("/editCourse/{menuid}/{course}") public Menu updateCourse(@PathVariable String menuid, @PathVariable String course)
      Use "/editCourse/" followed by the menuId then course on putMapping to find the menuId and change its course.
      Parameters:
      menuid - The ID of the menu entity to change the course of.
      course - The course that'll overwrite the previous course field.
      Returns:
      The new menu entity saved to the db, or null if the ID is not valid.

    • searchMenu

      @GetMapping("/search/{keyword}") public List<Menu> searchMenu(@PathVariable String keyword)
      Use "/search/" on getMapping followed by the keyword to return a list of menu entities according to that specific keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword of the menu entity that should be returned.
      Returns:
      a list of all menu entities with that specific keyword

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/getByID/{id}") public Optional<Menu> getById(@PathVariable String id)
      Use "/getByID/" on getMapping followed by the menuId to return a specific menu associated with the menuId given.
      Parameters:
      id - the menuId of the menu entity that should be returned.
      Returns:
      An Optional which contains the order that's associated with the given menuId, Optional is empty if the menuId was not valid.

    • deleteAll

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteAll") public void deleteAll()
      Use "/deleteAll" on delete mapping to delete all Menu objects in the repo.
